effect.short: Has a $effect_chance% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.
effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a 30% chance to lower the target's accuracy by one stage.

flavorTexts.text:
The user launches a hard-packed mud ball to attack.
This may also lower the target’s accuracy.
